title: Torah (JPSA) 02: Exodus
description:
The second book of the Pentateuch - Exodus. Presented according to weekly parshah.
Praised are You, Adonai, Our G-d, ruler of the Universe, who has made us holy with commandments and commanded us to engage in the study of Torah. (Introduction by Linette Geisel & traditional prayer. Parshat descriptions provided by Wikipedia)

sections.title: Parshat Shemot - Exodus 1:1 - 6:1 Affliction in Egypt, Moses is found and called, Pharaoh
Parshat Va'eira - Exodus 6:2 - 9:35 Plagues 1 to 7 of Egypt
Parshat Bo - Exodus 10:1 - 13:16 Last plagues of Egypt, first Passover
Parshat Beshalach - Exodus 13:17 - 17:16 Parting the Sea, water, manna, Amalek
Parshat Yitro - Exodus 18:1 - 20:23 Jethro’s advice, The Ten Commandments
Parshat Mishpatim - Exodus 21:1 - 24:18 The Covenant Code
Parshat Teruman - Exodus 25:1 - 27:19 God's instructions on the Tabernacle and furnishings
Parshat Tetzeveh - Exodus 27:20 - 30:10 God's instructions on the first priests
Parshat Ki Tisa - Exodus 30:11 - 34:35 Census, anointing oil, golden calf, stone tablets, Moses radiant
Parshat Vayakhel - Exodus 35:1 - 38:20 Israelites collect gifts make the Tabernacle and furnishings
Parshat Pekudei - Exodus 38:21 - 40:38 The Tabernacle is set up and filled
